title: Portfolio Site
description: This website has a soft illustrative and elegant theme. Contrasted with a bright lemon/lime tech colour and perfectly compliments my style. The images were generated by AI and further edited in photoshop.
alt: fanciful white and pink kangaroo mouse wearing gold jewellery

title: Code Refactor
description: This simple website was using non-symantic html elements and a lot of repeated code in the CSS. The HTML elements were changed and the CSS was consolodated.
alt: fanciful white and pink otter wearing gold jewellery

title: Earthquake Data Analysis
description: This is an exploration of earthquake data of one month. I analyse the data and make some reference charts that quickly tell me infomration about the column's data. After cleaning and running test I explore data accuracy of reports from all the sysmic networks. I also make some charts showing the volume of earthquakes by reported magnitude..
alt: fanciful white and pink hedgehog wearing gold jewellery

title: MUD Game
description: A mini MUD game made using python and played in an IDE. The text per room is displayed at a slowed pace as it may be shown in a deployed app along with nice spacing. The keyboard controls your movements using WSAD keys for north, south, east and west.
alt: fanciful white and pink bird wearing gold jewellery
